PresentationColumn.name: Start Stage
PresentationColumn.Description: All the Stages the Opportunity has been in during its lifecycle. Use this field to report on Total Time Spent in a Stage or report on Start and End Dates of a Stage.

PresentationColumn.name: End Stage
PresentationColumn.Description: All the Stages the Opportunity has completed during its lifecycle.

PresentationColumn.name: Operation
PresentationColumn.Description: Shows whether record was created or modifed.

PresentationColumn.name: Employee Login
PresentationColumn.Description: Login of person who made the change.

PresentationColumn.name: Stage Start Date
PresentationColumn.Description: Date when Opportunity Stage Started.

PresentationColumn.name: Stage End Date
PresentationColumn.Description: Date when Opportunity Stage completed.

PresentationColumn.name: Field
PresentationColumn.Description: Field name that was changed.

PresentationColumn.name: Start Source
PresentationColumn.Description: The Source of the Opportunity when the transition started. This shows what the source of the Opportunity was at the Stage Start Date.

PresentationColumn.name: Start Source Decription
PresentationColumn.Description: The Source that caused the Stage of the Opportunity to be changed.

PresentationColumn.name: End Source
PresentationColumn.Description: The Source of the Opportunity when the transition ended. This shows what the source of the Opportunity was at the Stage End Date.

PresentationColumn.name: End Source Decription
PresentationColumn.Description: The Source that caused the Stage of the Opportunity to be changed.

PresentationColumn.name: Start Campaign Name
PresentationColumn.Description: The Campaign for the Source of the Opportunity when the transition started.

PresentationColumn.name: Start Campaign Code
PresentationColumn.Description: The Campaign for the Source of the Opportunity when the transition started.

PresentationColumn.name: Start Campaign Date
PresentationColumn.Description: The Start Date of the Campaign for the Source of the Opportunity when the transition started.

PresentationColumn.name: End Campaign Name
PresentationColumn.Description: The Campaign for the Source of the Opportunity when the transition ended.

PresentationColumn.name: End Campaign Code
PresentationColumn.Description: The Campaign for the Source of the Opportunity when the transition ended.

PresentationColumn.name: End Campaign Date
PresentationColumn.Description: The Start Date of the Campaign for the Source of the Opportunity when the transition ended.

PresentationColumn.name: First Flag
PresentationColumn.Description: Indicates that this stage transition is the earliest one belonging to the parent opportunity

PresentationColumn.name: Closed Flag
PresentationColumn.Description: Indicates that the stage transition does not have an end stage because the parent opportunity was closed

PresentationColumn.name: Closed Date
PresentationColumn.Description: Date that the parent opportunity was closed

PresentationColumn.name: Closed Reason
PresentationColumn.Description: Why the parent opportunity was closed
